summary: REQ-20 copy updates were applied to the Home page hero, ServicesPreview Express Delivery card, ValueProps “Lightning Fast” description, and ServicesPage Domestic Courier description to remove “same day/same-day” wording. However, the diff does not provide evidence of a repository-wide cleanup/check, and the ServicesPreview content appears to introduce/rename services beyond the stated non-goal service set.

missing_requirements.requirement: A repository-wide check confirms there are no remaining user-facing occurrences of “same day” or “same-day” related to delivery promises in the frontend pages/components updated for this change.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows edits to specific files, but does not include evidence of a repo-wide search/check or confirmation that other user-facing pages/components contain no remaining occurrences.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/introduced service offerings in the Home Services preview (e.g., added “International Freight” and “Standard Shipping”, and used “Express Delivery” naming), which may alter the set/presentation of services beyond the requested copy removal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal explicitly says not to change the set of services offered (International courier, Domestic courier, Vacuum service, Indo-Canadian bus service). The ServicesPreview now lists a different set of three services.
